package.description: Provides rich language support for JavaScript and TypeScript.
package.reloadProjects.title: Перезавантажити Проект
package.configuration.suggest.completeFunctionCa: Повний набір функцій з їх підписом параметра.
package.configuration.suggest.includeAutomaticOp: Enable/disable showing completions on potentially undefined values that insert an optional chain call. Requires TS 3.7+ and strict null checks to be enabled.
package.typescript.tsdk.desc:
Specifies the folder path to the tsserver and lib*.d.ts files under a TypeScript install to use for IntelliSense, for example: `./node_modules/typescript/lib`.

- When specified as a user setting, the TypeScript version from `typescript.tsdk` automatically replaces the built-in TypeScript version.
- When specified as a workspace setting, `typescript.tsdk` allows you to switch to use that workspace version of TypeScript for IntelliSense with the `TypeScript: Select TypeScript version` command.

See the [TypeScript documentation](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/typescript/typescript-compiling#_using-newer-typescript-versions) for more detail about managing TypeScript versions.
package.typescript.disableAutomaticTypeAcquisiti: Disables automatic type acquisition. Automatic type acquisition fetches `@types` packages from npm to improve IntelliSense for external libraries.
package.typescript.tsserver.log: Дає можливість ведення журналу сервера TS до файлу. Цей журнал можуть використовуватися для діагностики сервер TS питання. Журнал може містити шляхи до файлів, вихідний код і іншу потенційно конфіденційну інформацію з вашого проекту.
package.typescript.tsserver.pluginPaths: Additional paths to discover TypeScript Language Service plugins. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.0 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.tsserver.pluginPaths.item: Either an absolute or relative path. Relative path will be resolved against workspace folder(s).
package.typescript.tsserver.trace: Дає можливість відстеження повідомлень, надісланих на сервер TS. Це трасування можна використовувати для діагностики проблем із сервером TS. Трасування може містити шляхи до файлів, вихідний код і іншу потенційно конфіденційну інформацію з вашого проекту.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterConstructor: Defines space handling after the constructor keyword. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.0 or newer in the workspace.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterSemicolonInForSta: Defines space handling after a semicolon in a for statement.
package.format.insertSpaceBeforeAndAfterBinaryOp: Визначає обробку пробілів після бінарного оператора.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterKeywordsInControl: Визначає обробку пробілів після запитів у інструкції управління потоком.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterFunctionKeywordFo: Визначає обробку пробілів після ключового слова function для анонімних функцій.
package.format.insertSpaceBeforeFunctionParenthe: Defines space handling before function argument parentheses.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterOpeningAndBeforeC: Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty parenthesis.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty brackets.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing non-empty braces. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.0 or newer in the workspace.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing template string braces.
Defines space handling after opening and before closing JSX expression braces.
package.format.insertSpaceAfterTypeAssertion: Defines space handling after type assertions in TypeScript. Requires using TypeScript 2.4 or newer in the workspace.
package.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForFunctio: Визначає, чи відкрити дужку з нового рядку для функції чи ні.
package.format.placeOpenBraceOnNewLineForControl: Визначає, чи відкрити дужку з нового рядку для блоків управління чи ні.
package.format.semicolons: Defines handling of optional semicolons. Requires using TypeScript 3.7 or newer in the workspace.
package.format.semicolons.ignore: Don’t insert or remove any semicolons.
package.goToProjectConfig.title: Перейдіть в Налаштування проекту
package.typescript.referencesCodeLens.enabled: Enable/disable references CodeLens in TypeScript files.
package.typescript.implementationsCodeLens.enabl: Enable/disable implementations CodeLens. This CodeLens shows the implementers of an interface.
package.typescript.openTsServerLog.title: Відкритий сервер TS журналу
package.typescript.selectTypeScriptVersion.title: Select TypeScript Version...
package.javascript.implicitProjectConfig.checkJs: Enable/disable semantic checking of JavaScript files. Existing jsconfig.json or tsconfig.json files override this setting. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.1 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.npm: Specifies the path to the NPM executable used for Automatic Type Acquisition. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.4 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.check.npmIsInstalled: Перевірте, чи встановлено NPM для автоматичного отримання типу.
package.configuration.suggest.names: Enable/disable including unique names from the file in JavaScript suggestions. Note that name suggestions are always disabled in JavaScript code that is semantically checked using `@ts-check` or `checkJs`.
package.typescript.tsc.autoDetect: Controls auto detection of tsc tasks.
package.typescript.tsc.autoDetect.on: Create both build and watch tasks.
package.typescript.tsc.autoDetect.build: Only create single run compile tasks.
package.typescript.tsc.autoDetect.watch: Only create compile and watch tasks.
package.typescript.problemMatchers.tsc.label: TypeScript проблеми
package.configuration.suggest.paths: Enable/disable suggestions for paths in import statements and require calls.
package.configuration.tsserver.useSeparateSyntax: Enable/disable spawning a separate TypeScript server that can more quickly respond to syntax related operations, such as calculating folding or computing document symbols. Requires using TypeScript 3.4.0 or newer in the workspace.
package.configuration.tsserver.maxTsServerMemory: Set the maximum amount of memory (in MB) to allocate to the TypeScript server process
package.typescript.locale: Sets the locale used to report JavaScript and TypeScript errors. Requires using TypeScript 2.6.0 or newer in the workspace. Default of `null` uses VS Code's locale.
package.javascript.implicitProjectConfig.experim: Enable/disable `experimentalDecorators` for JavaScript files that are not part of a project. Existing jsconfig.json or tsconfig.json files override this setting. Requires using TypeScript 2.3.1 or newer in the workspace.
package.configuration.suggest.autoImports: Enable/disable auto import suggestions. Requires using TypeScript 2.6.1 or newer in the workspace.
package.taskDefinition.tsconfig.description: The tsconfig file that defines the TS build.
package.javascript.suggestionActions.enabled: Enable/disable suggestion diagnostics for JavaScript files in the editor. Requires using TypeScript 2.8 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.suggestionActions.enabled: Enable/disable suggestion diagnostics for TypeScript files in the editor. Requires using TypeScript 2.8 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.preferences.quoteStyle: Preferred quote style to use for quick fixes: `single` quotes, `double` quotes, or `auto` infer quote type from existing imports. Requires using TypeScript 2.9 or newer in the workspace.
package.typescript.preferences.importModuleSpeci: Preferred path style for auto imports.
Automatically select import path style. Prefers using a relative import if `baseUrl` is configured and the relative path has fewer segments than the non-relative import.
Based on the `baseUrl` configured in your `jsconfig.json` / `tsconfig.json`.
package.typescript.updateImportsOnFileMove.enabl: Enable/disable automatic updating of import paths when you rename or move a file in VS Code. Requires using TypeScript 2.9 or newer in the workspace.
Never rename paths and don't prompt.
package.typescript.autoClosingTags: Enable/disable automatic closing of JSX tags. Requires using TypeScript 3.0 or newer in the workspace.
package.configuration.surveys.enabled: Enabled/disable occasional surveys that help us improve VS Code's JavaScript and TypeScript support.
package.configuration.suggest.completeJSDocs: Enable/disable suggestion to complete JSDoc comments.
package.typescript.preferences.renameShorthandPr: Enable/disable introducing aliases for object shorthand properties during renames. Requires using TypeScript 3.4 or newer in the workspace.
